description:
Happy Holidays, Electrosex fans!! I hope you all enjoy this softer site of Electrosluts. So, bundle up away from the holiday chill that's keeping you inside eagerly awaiting this hot, steaming, electrifying Christmas morning sex treat!
Skin and Alyssa have been counting down the days to give each other very special, very secret, very sex gifts. They race down Christmas morning in anticipation for what joy is to come. They each rip open into their gifts to reveal and assortment of electrosex toys that will give them both a Christmas they'll never forget!!!
title: A Very Sexy Electro-Christmas
